data.title: Full List of all Rio 2016 Boxers
data.meta_description: The full list of who will be competing in Rio has been finalised
data.text:
The 286 boxers for next month’s Rio Olympics have been finalised.

In all, eight out of a possible thirteen Irish boxers will represent their county in Brazil at the 31st Olympiad.

This leaves Ireland joint eleventh with Algeria and the United States in terms of boxers qualified

Kazakhstan and Great Britain send the largest squads with 12 apiece. Azerbaijan, China, France, Russia, and Uzbekistan all have 11.

The list of qualified boxers are:
